name: Daiwa House Industry Co.,Ltd.
short_description: Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business worldwide.
long_description: Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business worldwide. It operates through Single-Family Houses; Rental Housing; Condominiums; Existing Homes Business; Commercial Facilities; Logistics, Business and Corporate Facilities; and Other Businesses segments. The company is involved in the provision of single-family housing contracting, rental housing, and condominium selling activities; home interior renovation and real estate agency support services; commercial facilities development services; and logistics, business, and corporate facilities construction services. It also manufactures steel and timber housing parts; offers ground survey and reinforcement services; and constructs retail and wholesale, medical and nursing care, office and factory, urban development and industrial park, energy, environmental greening, agriculture, parking and carsharing, and power producer supplier facilities. In addition, the company operates resort hotels and golf courses, business and city hotels, fitness clubs and aesthetic salons, and home centers; provides robotics technologies for use in hospitals, care facilities, factories, and construction sites; manages private homes for the elderly and assisted-living residential facilities for seniors; and offers parking services, as well as credit card and insurance agency services. Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
